<template>
  <v-form ref="form">
    <v-text-field
      v-model="username"
      :rules="[(v) => !!v || 'Username is required']"
      label="Username"
      required
    ></v-text-field>

    <v-text-field
      v-model="password"
      :rules="[(v) => !!v || 'Password is required']"
      label="Password"
      required
      type="password"
    ></v-text-field>

    <v-btn @click="submit">Login</v-btn>
  </v-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      username: "",
      password: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    submit() {
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        // Form is valid, proceed with login logic
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
